V0213_01_00_01_0.text: For what I've done in the past, I must pay a terrible price.

V0213_01_00_02_0.text: My darkness may appear to be gone, but it’s still with me.

V0213_01_00_03_1.text: I want to truly lose so that I can truly suffer.

V0213_01_00_04_0.text: I did things to you that I regret... and can’t take back.

V0213_01_00_05_0.text: No matter how fast I run, I can't outrun my past!

V0213_01_00_06_0.text:
No need to remind me of my sins.
I've never forgotten them.

V0213_01_00_07_0.text: To atone for my past, I must defeat the Dark Signers!

V0213_03_00_00_0.text: It seems you don't want me to lose.

V0213_03_00_03_0.text: What does fate have in store for me...

V0213_03_00_05_0.text: For fate to deal me a just end, I can't just simply lose.

V0213_05_00_00_0.text: Even I don't know what cards are left in my deck.

V0213_07_09_00_0.text: I flip over my Set card.

V0213_08_00_00_0.text: I can activate ZERO-MAX when I have 0 cards in my hand.

V0213_08_00_00_1.text: All monsters with lower ATK than mine are burned to ash.

V0213_08_00_01_0.text: I activate the Continuous Spell, Infernity Launcher.

V0213_08_00_02_1.text: It sends an Infernity monster to the Graveyard.

V0213_08_00_03_0.text: When my hand is empty, I can use my Launcher's extra effect.

V0213_08_00_04_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, Into the Void.

V0213_08_00_06_0.text: I send Wave-Motion Inferno to the Grave to use its effect.

V0213_08_00_06_1.text: It sends all the cards in my hand to the Graveyard.

V0213_08_00_09_0.text: I activate my Trap Card, Infernity Inferno.

V0213_08_00_10_1.text: I destroy the attacker and Special Summon an Infernity.

V0213_08_00_11_0.text: I flip over my Trap Card, Infernity Break.

V0213_08_00_12_0.text: I flip over my Trap Card, Infernity Reflector.

V0213_08_00_12_1.text: I Special Summon my destroyed monster and deal damage.

V0213_08_00_13_0.text: I activate Damage Gate to revive a monster.

V0213_08_00_13_1.text: As long as its ATK are equal or less than the damage I took.

V0213_08_00_14_0.text: I activate the Continuous Trap, Phantom Hand.

V0213_08_00_15_1.text: I banish my entire hand until my next Standby Phase.

V0213_08_00_16_0.text: I activate Hate Buster to destroy both our monsters.

V0213_08_00_16_1.text: And you take damage equal to your monster's ATK.

V0213_08_00_17_0.text: I flip over my Trap Card, Full Salvo.

V0213_08_00_18_0.text: I activate my Counter Trap, Infernity Barrier.

V0213_09_00_00_0.text: When my hand's empty, I can use Infernity General's effect.

V0213_09_00_01_0.text: I can show you this card to Special Summon it.

V0213_09_00_02_0.text: Infernity Archfiend lets me add a card to my hand.

V0213_09_00_03_0.text: Since my hand's empty, my Destroyer deals 1600 damage.

V0213_09_00_05_0.text: When my Necromancer is Summoned, it switches to defense.

V0213_09_00_06_0.text: My hand is empty, so I can activate Necromancer's effect.

V0213_09_00_08_0.text: I have no cards in my hand, so I can use my Mirage's effect.

V0213_09_00_09_0.text: Infernity Avenger's effect activates from my Graveyard.

V0213_09_00_20_0.text: I banish a card from your hand, field and Graveyard.

V0213_09_00_21_0.text: Void Ogre Dragon negates and destroys your card.

V0213_09_00_22_0.text: I banish Infernity Doom Slinger to negate the effect damage.

V0213_09_00_22_1.text: Next, you choose whether to use my Slinger's effect or not.

V0213_11_01_00_0.text: I Summon a monster in Defense Position.

V0213_13_00_18_0.text: Set your eyes on Infernity Doom Slinger!

V0213_37_00_00_0.text: The sinister spirits that inhabit these creatures combine!

V0213_13_00_25_0.text: I call forth Infernity Doom Dragon!

V0213_37_00_01_0.text: Let the spear shatter the frozen wastes!

V0213_13_00_26_0.text: Trishula, Dragon of the Ice Barrier!

V0213_37_00_02_0.text: Between the skies and the earth lies a chaotic void!

V0213_16_00_01_0.text: You were a fool to challenge me.

V0213_18_00_00_0.text: A direct attack is heading your way.

V0213_19_00_16_0.text: I'll attack with my Infernity Randomizer.

V0213_19_00_26_0.text: Trishula, Dragon of the Ice Barrier! Attack!

V0213_21_00_00_0.text: The only thing I have left in my life is Dueling.

V0213_21_00_01_1.text: Now show me what you can do.

V0213_21_00_04_1.text: It will soon be over for me...

V0213_21_00_05_1.text:
This is the best I can do.
The rest is left to fate.

V0213_28_00_01_0.text: This is a sign that I can't give up.

V0213_28_00_01_1.text: It’s time for me to stand up and Duel for what’s right.

V0213_28_00_02_0.text: The darkness within me has been replaced by light.

V0213_28_00_03_0.text: I was looking within to find something worth saving.

V0213_28_00_03_1.text: It never occurred to me to look outwards and help others.

V0213_28_00_04_0.text: Only you would think of Dueling to save me.

V0213_28_00_05_0.text: I will no longer run from my past.

V0213_28_00_05_1.text: I will fight for those who have lost their freedom!

V0213_29_00_00_0.text: Dueling will no longer haunt me.

V0213_29_00_02_0.text: Thank you for allowing me to meet my fate.

V0213_29_00_03_0.text: Destiny wanted you to defeat me.

V0213_29_00_03_1.text: At long last, the end is here.

V0213_29_00_04_0.text: I’m glad you’re the one who ended me, Yusei.

V0213_29_00_05_0.text: You don't seem satisfied with this victory, Jack.

V0213_29_00_06_0.text: Crow, I'm glad I was able to Duel you in my final battle.

V0213_29_00_07_0.text: This is the price I must pay for my crimes.

V0213_33_00_01_0.text: This is my empty hand combo.

V0213_33_00_02_0.text: Let's see if you can satisfy me.

V0213_30_00_00_0.text: I'm nothing more than a shell of a ghost.

V0213_30_00_01_0.text: Calm down. It's just a Duel.

V0213_30_00_02_0.text: Leave before Dueling overtakes your life.

V0213_34_00_01_0.text: I'll let fate run its course.

V0213_34_00_04_0.text: You want a taste of the Kalin Special?

V0213_34_00_05_0.text: C'mon! You can do better than that!

V0213_34_00_06_0.text: I won't let you make a mockery of Dueling!

V0213_34_00_07_0.text: That's not fair! You call yourself a Duelist?

V0213_34_00_09_0.text: You wanna beat me in one turn? Go for it!

V0213_34_00_10_0.text: I honestly don't remember what cards are in my deck.

V0213_34_00_11_0.text: Are you willing to take a risk?

V0213_34_00_12_0.text: Time for The Enforcers to do some enforcing!

V0213_32_00_00_0.text:
Yu-Gi-Oh!  nks
Where my time will come to an end.

V0213_32_00_01_0.text:
Yu-Gi-Oh!  nks
The Enforcers are back!

V0213_35_00_01_0.text: I must atone for my crimes.

V0213_36_00_02_0.text: It's not your fault. It's mine.
